name: Conair Velvet Touch Cushion Hair Brush, Compact Travel Detangler Brush for Curly or Straight Styles, Flex Cushion Base for Stress-Free Brushing, Blush Pink
short_description: MAXIMUM COMFORT, MINIMUM EFFORT: The versatile Conair Totally Smooth Cushion Hair Brush is great for all hair lengths. The soft-touch handle is easy to hold and the flexible cushion base and ball-tipped bristles won't snag or pull hair.

BRUSHES FOR EVERY HAIR STYLE: Our brushes deliver all the essentials you need to bring out your hair’s full beauty with natural bristles, comfy handles, and lightweight designs, from detanglers to blowout brushes.

CONAIR HAIR CARE: For generations, Conair has empowered you on your hair journey with a wide range of innovative hair tools, including hair dryers, curling irons, hair straighteners, and more. We make it easy to switch up your style every day.

Whether your hair is curly or straight, this small hair brush offers brushing made beautiful.
